snippet: If the G.O.P. is so crazy, why is it poised to nominate Mitt Romney?
abstract: If the G.O.P. is so crazy, why is it poised to nominate Mitt Romney?
lead_paragraph: Unlike the liberal writers quoted in my last post, Jacob Weisberg's column on Mitt Romney's inevitability doesn't indulge in wishful thinking about how the primary campaign is rendering Romney unelectable in the fall. But his desire to insist on the G.O.P.'s extremism to leads him into this seemingly-contradictory analysis:
